Levi his complaint: or, The moane of the poore ministerie. by William Guild, Minister at King-Edward.. Guild, William, 1586-1657.
23, [1] p.
Printed by Andro Hart, Edinburgh, : Anno 1617..
Ornament on t.p., printer's device at colophon (Mck. 378), initials, printed marginalia. Imprint: "By Authoritie." Signatures: A-C⁴. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
